column2: an A.M. Eatery////I went on a sunday around noon wait was Â ~1hr and i think it always like this on the weekends. Parked on the surrounding streets without any issue. Pancakes is my favorite thing from here so I ordered the flight with sweet potato
column3: blueberry danish and samoa flavor pancakes and they were all delicious. My personal favorite was the sweet potato. The portion was pretty good definitely enough for two people to share.
